description.value: Sight is the ability to observe lit objects, with the goal of orienting yourself on objects and people in a lit environment. This pertains to observing the light stimuli, and not processing them in the brain. A sight disorder can lead to things including orientation problems.

purpose.value: A derived profile from [zib-VisualFunction.VisualAid.Product](http://nictiz.nl/fhir/StructureDefinition/zib-VisualFunction.VisualAid.Product) to provide a version better suited for implementation purposes. This profile augments the base profile with elements found in the various use cases that have adopted the zib.
